    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82688</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Infrared absorption and reflection on black and white surfaces.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotabsorption und Reflexion auf den 
schwarzen und weißen Oberflächen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Absorption infrarouge et réflexion sur les 
surfaces noires et blanches.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Absorption infravermelho e reflexão em 
superfícies pretas e brancas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assorbimento dell'infrarosso e riflessione sulle 
superfici nere e bianche.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρη απορρόφηση και αντανάκλαση στις μαύρες και 
άσπρες επιφάνειες.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Absorción infrarroja y reflexión en superficies
negras y blancas.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that dark or black surfaces absorb infrared radiation while white or shiny surfaces reflect them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">black surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dark surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shiny surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß dunkle oder schwarze 
Oberflächen Infrarotstrahlung aufsaugen, während weiße oder 
glänzende Oberflächen sie reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les surfaces foncées ou 
noires absorbent le rayonnement infrarouge tandis que les surfaces 
blanches ou brillantes les reflètent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as superfícies escuras ou 
pretas absorvem a radiação infravermelha quando as superfícies 
brancas ou brilhantes as refletirem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le superfici scure o nere 
assorbono la radiazione infrarossa mentre le superfici bianche o 
lucide le riflettono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι σκοτεινές ή μαύρες
επιφάνειες απορροφούν την υπέρυθρη ακτινοβολία ενώ οι άσπρες ή 
λαμπρές επιφάνειες τους απεικονίζουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las superficies oscuras o 
negras absorben la radiación infrarroja mientras que las superficies 
blancas o brillantes las reflejan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schwarze Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dunkle Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">glänzende Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weiße Oberfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
